mapper.select: SELECT O.id AS id, O.name AS name, O.address AS address, O.phone AS phone, O.time AS time, O.id AS order_id, I.product_id AS product_id, I.quantity AS quantity, I.amount AS amount FROM order_items I INNER JOIN orders O ON I.order_id = O.id INNER JOIN products P ON I.product_id = P.id WHERE I.order_id = #{id}
